actionStep.name: Given I want to test my hook up
When hook up my tests
Then my hook up should pass

scenario.name: Logging Interface will expose a Log.Message

actionStep.name: Given I want to log a message
When I load the FatCat-Logger .dll
Then I should have a method to log a message

scenario.name: Logging Interface will expose a Log.Message with a string for a message

actionStep.name: Given I want to log a message
When I load the FatCat-Logger .dll
Then I should have a method to log a message taking a string

scenario.name: Logging Interface will expose a Log.Message with a arguments

actionStep.name: Given I want to log a message
When I load the FatCat-Logger .dll
Then I should have a method to log a message taking a arguments

scenario.name: Logging Interface will expose a Log.Exception for logging exceptions

actionStep.name: Given I want to log an exception
When I load the FatCat-Logger .dll
Then I should have a method to log an exception

scenario.name: Logging Interface will expose a Log.Exception for logging exceptions and accept an exception

actionStep.name: Given I want to log an exception
When I load the FatCat-Logger .dll
Then I should have a method to log an exception and accepts an exception

scenario.name: Logging Interface will expose a Log.EventViewer for logging messages to the event viewer

actionStep.name: Given I want to log an event viewer message
When I load the FatCat-Logger .dll
Then I should have a method to log to the event viewer

scenario.name: Logging Interface will expose a Log.EventViewer accepting a event viewer id, message, and arguments

actionStep.name: Given I want to log an event viewer message
When I load the FatCat-Logger .dll
Then I should have a method to log to the event viewer accepting an event viewer id, message, and arguments
